text: فاسقط علينا كسفا من السماء ان كنت من الصدقين

translations.translation: So make lumps from heaven fall down on us if you are telling the truth.'
But in case you are speaking the truth, then make a segment of the sky to fall upon us."
So cause a piece of the sky to fall upon us if you are truthful."
Let a part of the sky fall on us if what you say is true".
“Therefore cause a part of the sky to fall upon us, if you are of the truthful.”
So, cause a piece of the heaven to fall on us, if you are of the truthful!"
Therefore cause a portion of the heaven to come down upon us, if you are one of the truthful.
Then drop down on us lumps from heaven, if thou art one of the truthful.'
Then make fragments of the heaven fall upon us, if thou art of the truthful.
So cause a fragment of the sky to fall on us, if you are truthful."
So cause thou a fragment of the heaven to fall upon us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
Make a fragment of the sky falls upon us, should you be truthful.’
Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"
So cause a piece of the heaven to fall on us, if you are of the truthful!"
Drop down on us lumps from heaven, if you are one of the truthful'
So bring down on us pieces from the sky, if you are truthful.”
So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
[26:187] Then make fragments (read kisfan or kisafan) of the heaven fall upon us, if you are of the truthful’, in your Mission.
(Then make fragments of the heaven fall upon us) as punishment, (if thou art of the Truthful) that the punishment is coming.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفاً مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ } معناه قِطعٌ
 نَشأتْ لَهُمْ سَحابةٌ؛ فاستَظلّوا تَحتَها؛ فأَخَتْهم الرَّجفةُ

translations.translation:
And His saying - { then send down to us a heavy rain } - means a downpour.


{A cloud} rose up for them, so they {remained} beneath it. Then {their sister} the earthquake struck.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفاً } قطعاً { مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ } من بعض إقطاعها تهلكنا بها { إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّادِقِينَ } [الشعراء: 187] في أمرك هذا ورسالتك


وبعدما آيس شعيب عليه السلام عن إيمانهم { قَالَ } لهم مشتكياً إلى الله: { رَبِّيۤ أَعْلَمُ } بعلمه الحضوري { بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ } [الشعراء: 188] من أنواع الفسادات
 وبمقدار ما تستحقون عليها من الجزاء والعذاب
